lead_paragraph: Second-seeded Andy Roddick and fourth-seeded Robby Ginepri advanced to the semifinals at the RCA Championships in Indianapolis with straight-set victories yesterday. Ninth-seeded Xavier Malisse also advanced with an upset of third-seeded Fernando Gonzalez, 7-6 (4), 6-4.
